lore: Vulcanar himself created the Citadel as a mobile fortress. After asserting his dominance over the Great Pandemonium, the God decided to get rid of his pet, and he exiled it to a land that would eventually become Rodia. Wherever it went it sowed chaos fueled by its frustration, until one day, out of boredom, it decided to take a little nap that lasted until a recent incident involving Nether Orbs woke it up. With renewed vigor, the Citadel is ready to vent its anger on anyone it encounters.
menagerieDialog: Oh, I'm so tired...\n\n(It breathes out deeply, throwing your hood back and shaking your hair violently. A loose brick almost hits you.)
WRRRRAAAAAAGHHHH...\n\nUgh... Cough. Ahem. Sorry about that. I think a Troll got caught in my teeth.
The maximum number of decorations that can be placed inside me is 50. If you wish to place additional decorations, please remove some first.
I'm a castle within a castle. How strange!
(Its teeth are chattering, which makes far more noise than you would have imagined.)
name: Citadel
